title: The only time i troll when autofilled
body:
Is when I get my role, then someone dodges, then I get autofilled.

why should I lose my role to a dumb dodge? not ganna happen, I insta lock my role

replies.body: And in no way are you justified for doing so. Whatever reports you collect for doing that, are well deserved.

> [{quoted}](name=Axium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEg1UlsK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-29T01:25:05.748+0000)
>
> And in no way are you justified for doing so. Whatever reports you collect for doing that, are well deserved.

sure he is. as long as riot continues to ruin their game so will the players. he has every right to troll a garbage game

No.

People like you are the reason that guy you are using as an excuse dodged.
Do us all a favor and uninstall
why should the 4 other people on your team have to deal with that when they didn't dodge or do anything stupid?

> [{quoted}](name=Mecha MaIphite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=QEg1UlsK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-29T01:54:19.226+0000)
>
> why should the 4 other people on your team have to deal with that when they didn't dodge or do anything stupid?

why should I have to deal with getting support when I didn't dodge?
Why don't you quit whining and learn to take enjoyment from helping your team?
